sentences.sentence: As the Little Ice Age progressed, farmers probably moved their fields to lower elevations, infringing on the lands of other farmers and pushing people together, thus contributing to the aggregations.
sentences.translation: 随着小冰河期发展，农民可能把田地移到了海拔较低的地方，侵占其他农民的土地，把人们挤在一起，从而形成了集群式的社会。

sentences.sentence: Alignment here will identify which fields require aggregations.
sentences.translation: 而这里的校准将标识出哪些字段需要聚合。

sentences.sentence: This is also true if the aggregations are of a different nature.
sentences.translation: 如果聚合具有不同的属性，这也成立。
